attributes.action: recognise that Leeds United is no longer a big club and that the ridiculous petition recently started by Richard Corbett M.E.P.  is nothing more than a publicity stunt by him to gain votes and a futile grasping at straws by some deluded football fans as they prepare for their third season in the 3rd Division.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yorkshire MEP Richard Corbett has started a petition in Yorkshire asking for the football authorities to investigate whether the European Cup Winners Cup was fixed in favour of Milan (who won)
We believe there are more people who would be against this investigation and who are sick of Leeds United whining about one thing after another.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
